photo_localurl() - method of the class imdb_person
Get the URL for the movies cover photo 
photodir - attribute of the class mdb_config
Where to store images retrieved from the IMDB site by the method photo_localurl(). 
photoroot - attribute of the class mdb_config
URL corresponding to photodir, i. 
photosites() - method of the class imdb
Get the off-site photo URLs

PILOT_IMDBFALLBACK - constant defined inside the package MDBApi

Info about Production Companies 
prodNotes() - method of the class imdb
For not-yet completed movies, we can get the production state

pubprints() - method of the class imdb_person

purge() - method of the class mdb_base
Check cache and purge outdated files This method looks for files older than the cache_expire set in the mdb_config and removes them
